description: This table stores metadata for a list of post-discharge service providers that was given to a patient so that they can indicate their preference. The service providers that are part of the list are in PAT_SVC_PROV_SEARCH_RSLT.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the type of location used to generate the list of service providers


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Home Address


Patient Work Address


Patient Temp Address


Department Address


Zip Code


City, State


State


Free Text

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION
columns.description: The location used to generate the list of service providers. The format will vary based on the type of location used to search.

columns.name: SEARCH_RADIUS
columns.description: The radius from the location in miles searched to generate the list.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: GENERATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date/time the list of service providers was generated at.

columns.name: SEARCH_LIST_IDENT
columns.description: An ID for the list of service providers that is unique within the patient encounter it is on. This column is frequently used to link to the PAT_SVC_PROV_SEARCH_RSLT table.

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_CITY
columns.description: The city that is part of the location used to generate a list of service providers

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state that is part of the location used to generate a list of service providers


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code that is part of the location used to generate a list of service providers

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department used as the location to generate the list of service providers

columns.name: SEARCH_LOCATION_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The facility used as the location to generate the list of service providers or the parent location of the department used to generate the list.
